en.welcome:
Welcome to the HPA Maldives COVID-19 bot.

Here you can find quick links to services & information regarding the COVID-19 situation in Maldives.



What would you like to know about?
Choose a number

options.7. Call 1676: COVID-19 Call Center Operates 24hrs Call 1676 EOC Legal For approval and other legal matters eoclegal@health.gov.mv To book your vaccine appointment book.hpa.gov.mv To check your COVID-19 status & digital vaccine details https://covidsafe.gov.mv Haalubelun https://haalubelun.hpa.gov.mv/ MyHealth https://my.health.mv/ Psychosocial Support Call 1425 Saturday to Thursday, 12:00 - 00:00 Social Service hotline Call 1421 Locals and migrants needing food Vaccination related matters vaccine@health.gov.mv Contact Tracing To provide contact tracing information ct@health.gov.mv 1676 (press 3) Mass inspection To report businesses and institutions not compliant with the guidelines Call 7264574 inspection.heoc@health.gov.mv
